sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState } from 'react' import { types } from './App'; const DepositInput = ({ state, dispatch }) => { const [formInputs, setFormInputs] = useState({ ccNumber: "", expiryDate: "", cvv: "", amount: "", }); const onChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormInputs({ ...formInputs, [name]: value }) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(formInputs) axios.post(`/transactions/deposit/`, { ...formInputs, sender: state.currentUser, type: 'deposit' }) .then(res => { dispatch({ type: types.SET_ACTIVE, active: { title: '', param: '' } }) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

DEPOSIT

) } export default DepositInput
